# Jupyter Notebook

One of the analysis platforms available on AnVIL is Jupyter Notebook. This platform offers accessible analysis reports and interactive analyses incorporating multiple languages in the case of [Jupyter](https://support.terra.bio/hc/en-us/articles/360024898671-Interactive-analysis-with-Jupyter-Notebooks). This chapter focuses on launching and highlighting a few features for Jupyter Notebook.
